website_summaries.verdict: A large portion of diatomaceous earth by a trusted manufacturer – the one to get if you are a frequent user and want to save a few dollars.
pros: Offers a generous quantity of all-natural diatomaceous earth from "food grade" source
Safe and free of additives – can be used for numerous purposes
cons: Not 100% effective at eliminating various insects
Some reports of it having a strange flavor

customer_reviews.title: Sorness in my body is GONE
customer_reviews.text: I've heard many wonderful things about this product so I thought I would try it for my Candida. I must say: I've only been taking it for (2) days like it recommended to do. And, I've noticed so much more happening. I use to wake up so sore in the mornings, the past night I have slept great, woke up with NO soreness, my stomach is going down, and I've noticed my skin is looking better.....I'm so excited to see what else goes on with the Candida problem....This is giving me HOPE finally.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McNeese

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING in so many ways
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING in so many ways!!! I've lost weight, cleansed my intestinal track out and feel so much better all the way around!!! Best part it's 100% natural and safe! Added bonus your hair and nails will grow like crazy! It is so worth it and I, thankful I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennamarie

customer_reviews.title: Works great to kill fleas and de-worming
customer_reviews.text: I use this to treat my outdoor cat pen and house/garage for fleas. I also use it to de-worm my cats. Very happy with it. I use a 2 cup flour sifter to spread it around - also bought on Amazon. Sifter works soooo MUCH better than the pistol dusters they recommend to buy with this product. This is a link to the sifter I bought to spread the diatomaceous earth:

customer_reviews.title: Good for hay fever
customer_reviews.text: The diatom earth cleanese your body before enough allergen accumulate to cause the problem. It is better than any allergy medicine, I haven't use any medicine for allergy this year. I used Allegra none stop every spring about 7 years ago. Finally I can breathe better during the hay fever season without allergy medicine.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DE, everything you hear that is good about ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent DE, everything you hear that is good about DE is all true. It does cure candida, it does make you hair and nails grow like weeds, it does stop gray hair and balding, it does rid the body of mercury and other metals, it does kill worms, parasites and fungus (dries all this stuff up). Take milk thistle (helps the liver during detox) and psyllium husk to expel toxins quickly

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% diatomaceous earth
customer_reviews.text: This is not 100% diatomaceous earth, it is mostly 90% sodium bicarb or something like it. It took 14.8grams of citric acid to neutralize 20.2 of the diatomaceous earth. It bubbles like a volcano and lemon juice worked too. Real diatomaceous does not react like that.
customer_reviews.author: Clint D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I make face masks with it, put it in my smoothies, and put 1/4 cup in my bath water with epsom salts. This stuff has so many uses, it's amazing!!

customer_reviews.title: Food Grade DE, for all ages.

customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Diatomaceous Earth is a wow factor in our lives!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders. Nails hardened. Energy. Bathroom issues regulated. Toothpaste. Facial. Recommended to all we know!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bass

customer_reviews.title: This product is a good example of not believing everything you read on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good example of not believing everything you read on the internet. Contrary to many reviews, this did nothing to deter simple black house ants from coming into the house. They wandered in it, crossed the barrier I laid down around the outside perimeter of the house to the cat food bowl inside then back out to their nest. I've also seen other bugs crawling through this stuff with no apparent ill effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY bad for your lungs & Does not work for fleas
customer_reviews.text: this definitely does NOT work for fleas.... really not sure who would even say that it does 🤔. I don’t even have a major flea problem but it did nothing for what I do have and I applied ALOT of powder. I also want to let people know to be careful and to actually use a respirator mask for use. I didn’t do this and found out that his product ca ben EXTREMELY bad for your lungs. I feel like I am starting to have a health problem from the powder and am going to make an appointment with my doctor to check my lungs. Good luck to everyone else I’m going to all an exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I originally purchased this to DE-WORM my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I originally purchased this to DE-WORM my kittens. 1) Good for my kittens 2) Good for me (I don't have worms, but it's great for Hair & Skin, also removes heavy metals from the body) . Important note: Diatomaceous Earth is ground ultra-fine... AVOID breathing it in, when using/preparing it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert ClickmBear

customer_reviews.title: Die you damn dirty insects and your queen too
customer_reviews.text: Die you damn dirty insects and your queen too! I have been waging war against a large colony of tiny ants while working in the yard. One night I found out the hard way that these little a-holes are aggressive and bite. Behold! The power of food quality diatomaceous earth! Sprinkled it onto the aggressors and while they did not perish at that moment, I knew they would be carrying the deadly powder back to their underground dwelling whilst my pups were safe from harmful chemicals or traps. Where I have sprinkled, they have fled and died a merciless death. Quality product, pound for pound.
customer_reviews.author: Donut208

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff for my homemade deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff for my homemade deodorant, though I wish I had purchased a smaller bag since I only use a tablespoon at a time. This bag will last me approximately 400 years.

customer_reviews.title: Bag received does not look like picture!

customer_reviews.title: I can't say whether it has helped my skin tone (I'm 74) but I definitely noticed that I slept better as the hip pain was not wak
customer_reviews.text: Been taking a heaping TB ful morning and evening and I notice that my nails are beginning to grow for the first time in years. My hair is growing faster, and my eyebrows are filling in. I can't say whether it has helped my skin tone (I'm 74) but I definitely noticed that I slept better as the hip pain was not waking me up once or twice every night. I'll take any help I can get for my bones and joints. Also, this is a great bargain and the 10 lb. will last about six months. Plus I can always use it on my plants !

I went ahead and purchased it and it sat in its box in the laundry room for awhile, before I had the courage to open and experiment. WOW! After a week of using it, I feel the difference! There is not a day that goes by that I don't put a teaspoon in a drink! It really clears your digestive system! Glad that I bought it and will continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ahed

customer_reviews.title: Mix with animal feed (dogs, cats, farm animals) ...
customer_reviews.text: Mix with animal feed (dogs, cats, farm animals) to eliminate most types of worms and other intestinal parasites. Powder must be mixed well with feed .25 cup/10lbs and allowed to be absorbed onto feed for a day or so before feeding animals. Powder is only harmful if breathed in by humans or animals (wear a dust mask while pouring into feed).
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how well it works and my cat has no ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this around my cats food bowl and the parameter of my room to keep away fleas, cockroaches, and lately ants. It's amazing how well it works and my cat has no health issues with it--which is amazing. She is super, highly allergic and this works well for both of us. I will always use this now. And coming from living in an RV for a time and how hard it is to keep critters out--This was by far the most effective thing I tried out of various types of pest control.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I use it to clean my face. I make it into a mask by adding water and and letting it dry (around 5 minutes). My skin has never looked and felt better. I also mix 2 teaspoons in some carrot juice and drink each day. It has really helped me! The carrot juice already has a earthy taste that I like and adding this to it really makes no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Order it Alone. The bag might bust during shipment!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is just as described and all of that, BUT YOU MUST, PLEASE, ship this bag in some sort of protective covering. I received it completely busted open inside the box and all other items in the box were covered in it! ugh. So my suggestion to anyone buying it... buy it alone. Have it shipped alone. If it were to break open at least it won't be all over anything else you ordered. And you don't know that it's busted open until you open the box - woo-hoo! suprise! LOL, what a mess. Anyway, aside from that, all is well. ;)
customer_reviews.author: REGINA MCGEE

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous- tiny dust particles entered my lungs.
customer_reviews.text: Awful and Dangerous ! I return this product ! The tiny dust particles entered my lungs causing irritation to my nose and throat. I had difficulty breathing for days. I do not recommend it . I even used a dust mask 😷 but tiny particles released to air went everywhere in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Messimeri

customer_reviews.title: Try it!!
customer_reviews.text: I take high blood pressure medication and have RA. I normally have terrible ankle swelling during the hot summer.....and when I drink wine......but since I have been taking this I have had NO swelling!! And its been a hot summer and I can drink wine!! Also my blood pressure is perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for my dogs and foster dogs and it's worked really well to kill any ticks, worms, etc that the fosters might bring in from poor conditions. I use it everyday

customer_reviews.title: Works well on ants. Works good as a natural supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: This was purchased for several applications. The main 2 were ants and as a body detoxifier. It worked well for both. Pros: 1) Good quality ingredients. 2) Easy to spread. 3) Prevents ants. 4) Detoxifies the body. 5) I have had no side effects. 6) Safe to use around vegetables and plants and bees. 7) Lasts a long time in glass container in a cabinet. I've had mine for over 2 years and it still works well. Cons: 1) Can be washed away rapidly by rain if used outdoors. Suggestions: Using a squirt bottle, like the ones used for ketchup, helps to spread it around the house for ants.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Improved Health
customer_reviews.text: I take 1 tablespoon per day in a glass of water or with my protein drink. It has no flavor or texture so it is very easy to incorporate into my diet. My aches and pains are 90% gone, my acne cleared up, my blood sugar has stabilized, my energy is way up. My constant chest congestion and stuffy nose are completely gone. I am taking this to get rid of candida but the health benefits are truly amazing. I will take this for the rest of my life and definitely be reordering from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Killed parasites and bacteria.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I've been drinking a spoonful of this stuff everyday, and so far all the parasites in my gut have been killed and virtually bacteria have been cleared and killed from my body (bad bacteria that is). This stuff has also cleared my acne, I have a nice clean face now. 10 stars for this product. Also forgot to add, I feed this stuff mixed in my dog's food. This has also killed my dog's parasites, and worms. Saved me a couple hundred bucks from going to the vet for a treatment. Also saved my dog from the cancer causing chemicals they would prescribe him.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Discover DE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! It cleans stainless steel and silver like magic, as well as tile, grout and even takes stains out of clothes. I made a paste of it and applied to a badly stained white jacket, left it overnight, then lightly scrubbed and rinsed and the jacket is like new! It's also a safe and effective ant deterrent. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Linden

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Sent Old Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10 pound bag and it tastes horrible. The bag a had 11/12 (November 2012) date clearly marked, that is more than 6 years old! Here is a picture of the powder I was taking (right) and what you just sent, notice the difference in color? Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Discrning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked on peace
customer_reviews.text: I love this. No bad taste or texture, is nice in tea with stevia. I use a heaping tablespoon in the mornings and wait at least an hour to eat and I don't get hungry, but have a peaceful feeling in my gut. It think it helped my mood, and my spinal disc issues. This works great for ants as well, keeping it on the windowsill.
customer_reviews.author: Tantra Bensko

customer_reviews.title: JUST DON’T
customer_reviews.text: I have this stuff all over, my vacuum is broken (actually 3 including the shop vac) and the food grade stuff has an increased inhalation risk. And I have 3 little ones with asthma. I made the mistake of bringing in a homeless cat with fleas. I sprayed it with flea spray too but we now have an infestation. THE NIGHTMARE CONTINUES as I now try to clean up my entire 7 bedroom house of this stuff and try to keep the air clean to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT CONSUME THIS CRAP
customer_reviews.text: POISON- DO NOT INJEST. IN FACT DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. I took 1/2 tsp with juice then 15min later I felt dizzy like the room was spinning, i felt like something was seriously wrong. Next day I tried it again, SAME THING. I'm going to call the phone # listed on the bag and speak to the company. They should not be telling people it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Choogy Boogy

customer_reviews.title: The place for diatomaceous earth in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: If you need diatomaceous earth, this is a good choice. It's a great value for the amount you get. The quality is good. And it works for a variety of things. It is great for pest control on a number of different bugs. It can be used in the garden. It can absorb smells, act as a deodorizer, and soak up oil. You can use it as an exfoliant. You can use it as a scouring agent. This bag allows you to use it everywhere. The bag is strong and durable, and it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Duramonov

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant taste when there should be no taste
customer_reviews.text: This has a taste, unlike all other diatomaceous earth I've had before, almost like it was cut with clay or baking soda. Every other brand I've tried just had a gritty mouthfeel, not the alkaline flavor this has. I found it much harder to get it down because of this and because I got it to replace some other DE that hadn't quite run out yet, by the time I used this the return window had closed. So now I'm stuck with 10 pounds of something I dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great mineral!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great mineral! Initially, it's weird drinking this because it's gritty in your mouth when you're drinking it, but it doesn't have a taste to it. After about a week it doesn't seem weird drinking it. This is a good colon cleanse, it does clear you out very well. It also does help curb my sugar cravings after I drink this in the morning and at night. I will definitely continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marron

customer_reviews.title: My chicks loved it
customer_reviews.text: My flock of chickens weren't doing well they all had gotten worms and were having a hard time, got this and now my chickens couldn't be happier. They all are back to normal no warms their eggs are clean. Pretty wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: Honest opinion after using this product a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I used this product before for bug controls in both inside house and gardening. It worked ok for inside house. I didn't see the effect for bug controls in garden as many gardeners suggested. I wanted to give it a try one more time for gardening this year. I'm using this product as duster. Not working for killing bugs nor controls. I followed the directions as suggested but not working for me. So this will be my last purchase of this product.

A restful, (much needed sleep!) Second night, same restful sleep, (no side effects! No groggy feeling what soever! I must mention, i have recently started eating healther foods, (cutting drastically down on "fast foods", sodas and the like., I'll probably change my rating on this to 5 stars very soon, as i believe i'll reap even greater benefits within two weeks of maintaining my regimen! I no longer have to use any kind of harsh chemicals around my family. I use the poofer thing and go around poofing it everywhere. Yea the powder settles everywhere but worth not having the bug problem. I can poof it in tight places, small places, and hard to reach places and a poof and it goes a long way!

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this is a very safe product.
customer_reviews.text: I can't see how this would be a safe product to ingest, if it has a warning on it. I will use it for other things, but not to consume. Why is this listed as organic if it has a warning of Proposition 65? California’s Proposition 65, also called the Safe Drinking Water and Toxic Enforcement Act, first became law in the state in 1986. It is intended to help Californians make informed decisions about protecting themselves from chemicals that could cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm. I did email the company and they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Tattletails

customer_reviews.title: Fleas are GONE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as it was recommended to me from a friend to help reduce a flea problem we were having. We bought this in addition to a duster and did all the carpeting in our house with it. I suggest putting on a mask when spraying it because he can be kind of harsh on the lungs. We left the powder down for 24 hours and then vacuumed with a Shop-Vac. We repeated this process every other day for 2 weeks. Since we have a toddler and two animals we wanted a safe natural way to deal with the situation other than spraying chemicals everywhere. I'm so happy we opted for this. My house is now flea free!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I love diatomaceous earth and this seems to be a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I love diatomaceous earth and this seems to be a great brand. I have been taking it for about six months and I will stay on it for a long time. It has detoxed my body in ways I had no idea I need to. This has been the best medicine ever and cheapest without any side effects. I would suggest everyone try a little instead of all the medication the pharmaceutical companies are selling from blood pressure to cholesterol medications.

customer_reviews.text: We've included the diatomaceous earth in our supplement routine for several months. I have a chronic stomach condition and my husband has high cholesterol for which he cannot take statins. We have both had some relief from these medical problems, and expect things to continue to improve as time passes. We even give it to our dog. I strongly suggest buying in smaller quantity if used only as a nutritional supplement. It's good stuff, and because we bought the large quantity, we've been sharing with friends.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to get rid of a few blood ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get rid of a few blood sucking, nightmare creating bed bugs. After a year of battling them, never completely getting rid of them (as they would come back after everything I would do). I heard of this product getting rid of them, so I decided to try it..... after all I've tried everything else. Put it down on my carpet for 2 weeks and haven't seen them since. It's been over 3 months since I've been bitten thanks to this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Household Product
customer_reviews.text: We use this DE for everything you could imagine: 1) Personal hygiene (i.e., brushing teeth, clarifying hair, facial masks, skin care, bathing, and injuries, etc.) 2) Pet care (i.e., soak puppies paws after a day of play at the daycare, brush on coat to eliminate fleas, ticks, etc.), and put on food to eliminate parasites. 3) Use as a insect deterent outside/inside the house, put on carpet to refreshen, cleans pots and pans. 4) Personal health (i.e., in smoothies, coffee, juice and teas) helps to eliminate parasites, reduce/eliminate muscle soreness, digestive issues)

customer_reviews.title: And best of all
customer_reviews.text: I use this every year to treat the inside perimeter of my home to keep it bug free. It is safe for my cats and grandkids both to be around. And best of all, it works! I live in the South and so far this year, have only seen one waterbug (cockroach) in the entire house inside. Also keeps fleas and ants out of the house. I spread it liberally in the garage for a week by all entrances, then sweep it out.

customer_reviews.text: The bag received is not the bag shown in the advertisement. The powder has a different texture than my precious bag. I’m questioning if this is real diatomaceous earth and why there is a warning label on the bag

Make sure to drink plenty of water because this made me feel a little dehydrated even though I'm an avid water drinker. You need at least 12 oz of fluid when mixing this and to drink a glass of water right after consumption. I also used this on my dogs and on my sidewalk for bug control. This is also great for livestock or any animal that may be suffering from digestive/parasitic issues. If you are using this in your house be sure to purchase a duster for this because it will ruin your vacuum or you may inhale too much of it.

customer_reviews.text: I started taking this as a precaution since our puppy has worms (and also putting it in her food). Then I read up on all the benefits and now take 2 tsp every day. My skin is cleared and my nails grow faster and stronger. When I forget to take it I notice break outs and I feel more tired. Definitely has been an improvement for me and I will stick with it! Also the bag is HUGE. It will last you forever.

customer_reviews.text: I have been adding this to beverages a couple times a day as I'm detoxing and incorporating a ketogenic diet. No more sugar. Feeling great. Hair Skin and Nails are healthier!

customer_reviews.text: I usually buy from another company that sells this for $30/jar, so I was very pleased to see food grade DE for cheaper. This is a great value and great quality. As a supplement that I take with juice, I have enjoyed it. One thing I realized is I have to take this in the morning because if I take it at dinner I'm up all night with energy!!! Not good when I have to up for work.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a homeopathic vet, so when my dog had tapeworms i freaked. She told me to use this for 60 days (1 tablespoon for 60 lbs of dog once a day with their meal) It did the trick and it's all natural so I didn't have to give my dog any chemicals/prescription drugs. We were both happy and she's cured!!! i read it works well on hens to help their laying and so many other uses
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of moles naturally!
customer_reviews.text: I have a giant mole problem and this product works, not to kill the moles...but to kill the grubs that the moles eat. Within 3 months of putting this down, moles have all gone to find other sources of food. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elcee

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot speak to effectiveness of the product yet, but HORRIBLE lapse in judgment to package this Diatomaceous Earth in a box with other sharp-edged items with ZERO protection to its paper bag. This ripped open and exploded all over every item and all over my entryway and flooring. It better be nontoxic to human and pets because I got all over myself and my cat got a nose full. Sheer stupidity on Amazon's part, What a nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: I bought the expensive flea treatment from the vet for my dog...it is supposed to last a month and 2 weeks later he had fleas...i assumed he got them from our outdoor bunny and/or chickens but i checked them for fleas and none of them had any fleas or other parasites at all...i give them fresh bedding every day and i sprinkle diatomatious earth all over before i put down their fresh wood chips and no parasites!! I will sprinkle it on the dog now too....it also makes my hair and nails grow like crazy...love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Imfairlyamused

customer_reviews.title: Great natural detox and supplement
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great detoxer and overall natural benefit to your body in many ways. Start out small quantities and add more quantities slowly. Your body will balance out after you've been on it a while. But the important thing is (drink a lot of water with this product). Was recommended this product through my sister and I have been very satisfied with it. This product makes me feel like I'm taking care of my body I also add a little bit in our pets water and it helps during flea season as well as helps give their body more nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hudson

customer_reviews.title: but this stuff is great at keeping away the fleas
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before.....and am re buying..it keeps fleas off the stray cats i feed..I add it to get food everyday... Just lightly coat it....keeps her and the area around my house flea free.....their used to be a problem here before we purchased the house...the drive way...yard and I'm sure the stray cats were infested as well....now after we had a bug company cone out about 5 times last year.....and caught all strays but one and brought them in the garage at first...and they are free of all bugs...but this stuff is great at keeping away the fleas...between the spraying and this stuff its one year later and not one flea!
customer_reviews.author: Tracylynn McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Pesticide and Healthy Benefits for you!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We used it to kill ants, spiders and we drink it daily in our water for health benefits. I have slow metabolism and would go several days to week without bowel movement. Adjusting to the right dosage was a bit tricky to figure out but once I got it I was going regularly! We feel better taking DE as it gets rid of toxins in your body. We ran a slight fever when it was into our system thoroughly and those toxins were being released but after that the fever was gone and we felt good.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Mills

customer_reviews.title: Strange particles float when you add water. And very very gritty. What is this?
customer_reviews.text: I usually get this from a different seller, who must be out of business. This product has strange particles in it. Looks like large wood type fibers, small black particles that float to the top when you stir. And it's quite gritty. So much so that I choke on it. I will NOT order again. What I have had from a different seller is a lot higher quality and NO strange particles at all. Is this even safe?
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Works great on bugs, but not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something I could use to get rid of the parasites our rescue dog had, but would not endanger a curious pup or my grandchildren. This stuff works! I distributed it all over our back yard which is forested, and saw a significant reduction in the bug population. The only reason for the four stars is because it is not easy to load this fine powder into whatever you're using to distribute it (I followed the advice of some and used a condiment bottle), and because it can only work when it is dry outside, which means you have to re-do it every time it rains or you use the sprinklers. Please correct me if I'm wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jacks Grandma

customer_reviews.title: DE is also good for human consumption
customer_reviews.text: I was having so much trouble from ants getting into my apartment. I tried the liquid poison that you set out and that helped a little for a little time. The ants were clearly winning the war and at an alarming rate. I heard about DE from my brother and as a last ditch effort, bought this. It should have been my first defense... it would have been my ONLY defense. The ants are gone. As an added benefit, DE is also good for human consumption. YOU MUST GET THE FOOD GRADE. Do some research... great mineral intake. DRINK PLENTY OF WATER OR IT CAN CONSTIPATE YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: DE FAIL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to control sudden fleas I had in the house. It did nothing to slow them down. I tried Shaklee’s Basic H in a spray bottle solution with water and it did much better. What’s worse is that once it’s in your carpet it’s hard to get out. I had to wear my Covid mask 😷 at times just to be able to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pest Control That's Safer for Pets
customer_reviews.text: I use this for natural, safe pest control. We decided to got this route because of our dog. The fine dust is bit messy if you choose to use it indoors. It seems to be a good deterrent for ants and other crawling insects. I've used it on fruit trees before they blossom. It's only effective when it's dry, though.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: tastes nasty
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying this diatomaceous earth for years but the last bag I bought is really nasty. It has a very bad taste, it makes my tongue feel like its almost burning when I eat it. I cant even return it because its past the return window
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: POOL OWNERS!!- DON'T!! - TOO FINE PSI TRIPLES INSTANTLY!!
customer_reviews.text: Writing as i refil inground pool. Hayward ec65 10yrs experience. Clogged filter by the time i put 4 solo cups in. Psi went from 7 to 30 in 1 minute. My normal clean charge is 8. 1.5hp big pipes. I had to flush filter so many times i drained pool too low for skimmer only which i must select to get the food grade d.e. out of pipe. I've had pools over 20yrs. Side note- this de is not pure white, more like makeup color when draining filter. YES it is FINER powder then pool de.
customer_reviews.author: end user

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it works. Going into the winter months for the first time without daily arthritis pain. Just a tablespoon in the morning smoothie has made a great difference in our joints...so much less pain and more ease of movement.
customer_reviews.author: judyg

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting rid of fleas!
customer_reviews.text: We used this, two bug bombs, and extensive vacuuming to get rid of a flea infestation that lasted for about a month. This is perfect because we could safely put it right on the cat and not worry about harmful chemicals. Make sure you have the right kind of vacuum when you clean it up, because it can clog some vacuums. Ours has a HEPA filter that had to be cleaned out after every vacuuming for a while because it kept picking up more and more dust. Overall, will use this again if we have fleas.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: very pleased! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: We live on a few acres and have a walk out basement. Despite having the pest company spray and my husband additionally spraying our yard and perimeter, we had several ticks (a day) passing the barrier and getting in through our basement doors. I powdered this DE outside window sills and doorways the day it arrived and we haven't seen a tick in the basement since. It's been over a week now. Very, very pleased! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I looked hard for something I could use on my mint plants to stop the worms from eating them. I use the mint leaves in tea so I didn't want to spray it with a chemical. I also have pets and I also feed birds in my yard. I used an empty spice bottle to sprinkle the Diatomaceous Earth on several of my plants. Probably the worst part is that it is such a fine powder. You really do have to make sure there is no wind blowing at all. It works great once you can get on there.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett0522

customer_reviews.title: Great ant killer
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to Hawaii and the first thing I wanted to do is get plants for my yard. The thing is once I did ants took over my yard and were sucking the life out of my plants. They were so bad I could not sit on my patio. I swear I had thousands walking around like they paid rent. I did everything natural to try and kill them. Nothing worked until I tried this. I spread it around my plants in my plants and patio. I have not seen one ant. I’m so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nisaa Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Many uses just Google it first.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is safe for most animals and people. It is made of crushed shells so if allergic to seafood I don't recommend using this. It kills ants and aphids and other insects. I don't like that the tiny black ants love it. I used this for worming a stray dog that looked like death. Dosed him by dipping meat in it every day for 33 days. After 21 days he looked healthier. Repeated a couple days a week now. He looks amazing. Gained weight back and is super active.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Have Curbed Fleas
customer_reviews.text: Used this inside my house on the couches, dog beds, under furniture and on my carpets to kill any fleas. Going on three weeks and thankfully have not seen anymore. Everything was washed in hot water prior to putting the DE on/down. My dogs had flea baths and had topical flea product put on two days after the flea bath. Fleas have been out of control in Central Florida this spring. I also spread this on the grass using a hand spreader to kill any fleas in the yard. My house vacuum had issues with this poofing out of the allergy filter so I had to first use a shop vac then use the beater brush on my house vac
customer_reviews.author: Maxie'nMe

customer_reviews.title: Gritty
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased from this company twice and obviously had great results with their ultra-soft powdery Diatomaceous Earth. This bag was gritty, almost sandy and wouldn't dissolve. Returned and reordered, hoping to get the same light and fluffy product I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeen T Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good option for pest control.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for organic garden pest control and it worked pretty well. We had squash bugs in our garden in 2015 and this didn't really do well to keep that population down. For an indoor plant we got some gnat or fruit fly type bugs and this took care of those immediately. Its a very fine ground powder almost like powdered sugar in consistency. I would recommended getting one of those pesticide bulbs for applying the product. That allows you to mist it very finely and evenly. The 10lb bag will last you most likely a long time. I would buy this again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: EGReviewsTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Bag of a thousand uses
customer_reviews.text: This stuff apparently does it all! I got it mainly for my chicken coop as it keeps various critters away and is apparently good for the chickens to dust in and eat also. It does a great job of doing just that -- no mites, flies, ants or much of anything is bothering our coop anymore. I spread it around liberally and have been throwing it around the outside of the house because its has been doing a great job of keeping the crickets and ants away! It is quite messy, prepare to get a good dusting yourself! Do a Google search on this stuff, there are literally a ton of uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: DC 🐧

customer_reviews.title: Works for ants and safe for animals!
customer_reviews.text: Used this in our yard and inside my house to prevent fleas. Neighbor's pets were getting fleas this year which we have never had to worry about before. I like that it isn't dangerous to my animals like the chemicals in other pesticides. My cats and dogs never got fleas, so I like to think it worked. My brother-in-law used it in his attic where ants were getting in and he said it stopped them within a week.
customer_reviews.author: BacardiprincessTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I took a feral cat to have spayed after she gifted me two beautiful kittens. She took over my shop and also brought a flea circus with her. The folks at Operation Spay Bay told me about this stuff so I bought the ten pound bag. All I can say is fleas were dying all over my shop counters so I let the cats back in so they could roll around in it. It's amazing stuff! Only thing I didn't get was the duster bulb, get that. I have dusted all over the porch because I don't want my inside cats getting infested. Between this stuff and Capstar tablets I think I will get it under control in no time.
customer_reviews.author: PCBirdy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Try not to be overly generous when applying it in the house. The fine dust gets everywhere. I needed to buy a shop vac just to vacuum it up. It works great on my dogs. Definitely kills the fleas within 2-3 days. I apply it to the pups outside. I would recommend using gloves as it does dry out the skin relatively quickly. And wear a dust mask if you're like me and have asthma. Applying the DE with a flour sifter or an unused paint brush really helps with the spreading and getting it into carpets or floor seams.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Truly a product that works simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for stomach problems , Lost a few inches on the waist line too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works
customer_reviews.text: God rid of my Candida problem with 1 tea spoon.
customer_reviews.author: slymm

customer_reviews.title: Seller charged twice for one package
customer_reviews.text: Seller charged twice for one package. I have contacted them today and will update this review to reflect any changes they make. The product itself is perfectly fine. I have used it before and had good results with killing bugs. Update: seller sent a one-line reply the next day: "Let me look into this for you.” But so far no refund or acknowledgement of their mistake. Update: seller finally got back to me, but said that they never found two charges. In the end, I had to contact my bank to dispute the second charge. Will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Don't Spend Hundreds on an Exterminator
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the exterminators tell you this is dangerous - what we were told so we would use them. Buy FOOD GRADE, this means it can be eaten by people and pets and it is safe. However, it destroys pests like fleas and bedbugs. You need to leave it our for about 2 weeks to make sure any newly hatch bugs will be killed. We put all over our house, furntiure and beds after washing everything we could. Completely killed everything and save $1100. I can live with the mess to save that much money.
customer_reviews.author: MDB

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs fast!
customer_reviews.text: Used outdoors as a insect perimeter guard. Absolutely works! Noticed a dead cockroach, earwigs and scorpions in just 1 single day... given it's 110 degrees Fahrenheit here, they may have dehydrated more quickly than usual. Just ordered a 2nd bag to do the front yard. Diatomaceous Earth is a white powder and will leave a white chalk like appearance anywhere you use it. It's also my understanding that it works as long as it's there. I'll update this review regarding how long it lasts in the future. Thank you seller for the great price and great product, sure beats my local Home Depot and Lowes!
customer_reviews.author: N+B+O

customer_reviews.title: DE
customer_reviews.text: Had heard a lot about diatomaceoous earth for helping the body - my son and I have been drinking a glass of water with a teaspoon or tablespoon a day. I have noticed not quite as many aches in the joints - my son says his nails are growing faster and are much harder and in general it is helping him feel better. He also says that it has helped him control his appetite - he is eating less than before. This seems to be doing all what people claimed it to do - we did a lot of research on it before we decided to try it. Very glad we did try it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase, this is a very effective and useful product. I take a teaspoon everyday in my smoothie and my digestion is so much better. I feel healthier, my nails are growing faster and stronger too!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Haase

customer_reviews.title: Very effective on certain bugs.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any luck getting this to eliminate our flea problem. But I put a handful of this on ant piles and it does away with them. I spread it under our crawl space, and I found it killing roaches (American roaches, the large ones that feed on decaying matter). I didn't even know we had any down there. They just come out and die now. This doesn't effect the geckos that live around my house, which is actually pretty cool. I've tried many other chemicals and granules lately, and this one seems to be really working.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Ant Killer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like crazy!! I live on a small farm with sandy, dry soil. I scooped this stuff out w of the 10 lb. bag with a plastic pot that you would buy geraniums in. I then sprinkle the ant mounds. Within days, the mounds are all deserted with tiny little dead ants. CAUTION, don’t breath in dust. Even though it’s is NOT poison, it can be abrasive to the lungs. Also, you want to follow the ants around every week or so to kill off new sites!! Excellent product! Negative: I wouldn’t use in vegetable garden or flower gardens... it will kill all pollinators!
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Tears up your puppy's paws
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a flea preventative, we had no infestation but I wanted to be proactive as the weather warmed up. We sprinkled it throughout the yard but did not put it in the house or directly on the dogs. The dogs got it on their paws and it was so irritating the dogs licked their paws for literally hours until they were raw. I would not recommend it to pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn P

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in the morning to consume for inflammation and it works great! Bonus, it doubles as a pesticide and has cured our ant problem.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: DE, especially in the food grade spectrum, has many many useful uses. From your house plants, and getting rid of bugs, to your own health and digestive system. I just started taking it. I will update this review either with good, bad or ugly remarks. DON'T INHALE THE DUST!! (VERY... VERY... HARMFUL TO LUNGS)
customer_reviews.author: SHOP 907

customer_reviews.title: This certainly appears to be a very clean quality product ...
customer_reviews.text: This certainly appears to be a very clean quality product. I have only used it for a few days and I am already seeing results. I use it as an organic pest control method.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Has helped with bloating, yeast, etc..
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really helped with my candida and poofy stomach from, being vegan for 4 years. I now eat regularly and I don't diet. Its helped me loose weight and getting rid of my fungus as well as yeast infection. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great for bugs in kitchens
customer_reviews.text: We feed this to our dog as an anti-parasite treatment. Healthier than worm meds. Must be the food grade kind. We even use it from time to time for our own digestive systems! Great for bugs in kitchens, under the sink too. Kills them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Surprising results
customer_reviews.text: I am using diatomaceous earth since my daughter recommended it for a roach infestation, those big one, that happened in the spring. I sprinkle it behind everything and in every crack and entryway. It is not pretty but much better than roaches which I soon began to find dead on their back. It is not harmful to pets and the environment. That is of the utmost importance. I also began taking it in juice or water, and my digestive system is happy, which makes me happy. A side benefit is my fingernails are strong and do not break easily, and my hair is thicker.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynLA

customer_reviews.title: Natural ANT killer and more...
customer_reviews.text: The BEST natural cure to ANTS. I had a bad problem with ant hills all around my patio and out by the curb of the yard. Now the moment I see the pile, Diatomaceous to the rescue. I spray it all on the pile and within a 2 foot radius. It kills the hill and runs the survivors off, if there are any. I have only had to use it twice this year. Also helps around the house edge too. Just in case of other invaders. You cannot go wrong using this.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: Helped with a candida issue after antibiotics as well as improving skin and being a wonderful non abrasive detox
customer_reviews.text: Wow this was an impressive product! Helped with a candida issue after antibiotics as well as improving skin and being a wonderful non abrasive detox. Highly recommend if your struggling with being lethargic, and need a system reboot. So many health benefits here, I've been a nutritionist for 15 years in the health/fitness industry & this product impressed me quite a bit. It's easy to drink and has no taste, perfect thing to add in to a daily health regimen and there are so many amazing ways to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina H.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my fleas and very messy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I'd read all the reviews saying that was great to get rid of fleas. I applied it in areas were had fleas and I didn't notice any difference. The fleas remained and I ended up having to buy sprays to get rid of them after all. Plus, when I went to clean the powder up, I found that it does not like to be cleaned. Does not sleep well, it clogged my shop vac, it takes forever to mop the mess up. I will not recommend this for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: skall

product_meta.title: DiatomaceousEarth DE10, 100% Organic Food Grade Diamateous Earth Powder - Safe For Children & Pets 10 LBS
product_meta.description: Diatomaceous earth (DE) is essential for anyone looking for natural remedies in their home, yard, garden or homestead. This amazing product is made of tiny, fossilized diatoms (plankton) that accumulated over millennia in fresh water lakes. When mined and left untreated, this fine powder can be used in hundreds of different ways. At 10 pounds, it's easy to transport yet big enough for large projects making it our most popular size.
feature_bullets: Diatomaceous earth you can trust - Our obsession to create the purest food Grade diatomaceous earth affects every aspect of our business, from the quality of the deposits we mine from, to the stainless Steel equipment that handles the De.
The only official supplement - we are the only producers of food grade diatomaceous earth products that meet all requirements for health supplements in the USA
100% organic - all of our products are certified organic by the organic minerals review Institute

Nature's most diverse product - diatomaceous earth is an amazing powder that can be used for a wide range of applications from health supplement to pet care. Take a look at some of our reviews for a more thorough list of benefits and use cases
Wholly produced in the USA - our entire process from mining to filtering to packaging is all completed in the United States

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars11,186 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
